news.title: Iran says it reserves all options after ‘outrageous’ U.S. strikes, launches fresh attacks on Israel
news.summary: Iran launched its 20th wave of missile and drone strikes against Israeli military targets. Iran state-owned media Fars said the strikes were in response to Israel's actions in Syria.

news.title: Hegseth claims Iran's nuclear ambitions 'obliterated' after U.S. strikes
news.summary: Defense Secretary Pete Hegseth echoed remarks made by President Donald Trump Saturday following strikes on three major nuclear enrichment facilities in Iran. Heg Seth: "We are not going to stand by and let Iran get its hands on our weapons"

news.title: World leaders react after Trump says U.S. has bombed 3 nuclear sites in Iran, including Fordo
news.summary: World leaders react to U.S. attack on Iran's nuclear sites, including Fordo. President Donald Trump announced the attack Saturday. He called it a "very successful attack"

news.title: Satellite images show activity at Iran's Fordo nuclear facility before U.S. air strikes
news.summary: Satellite imagery shows activity at Iran's Fordo nuclear facility prior to U.S. air strikes. Maxar Technologies released satellite imagery on Sunday showing activity at the facility.

news.title: Trump pledged to be a 'peacemaker' in the Middle East — now the United States is entering a new war
news.summary: Five months ago, President Trump promised to be a peacemaker and a unifier. Tonight, the United States attacked Iran, hitting three nuclear sites in Fordo, Natanz, and Isfahan.

news.title: Investors brace for ‘unpredictable spillovers’ in markets after Trump announces Iran strikes
news.summary: U.S. joins Israel in attack on Iran's nuclear sites. Move puts the U.S in the middle of a Middle Eastern war. It could set up a potentially volatile market reaction.

news.title: As Trump badgers Fed to lower rates, it’s the bond market in need of convincing
news.summary: Trump wants to lower interest rates as two of his signature policy initiatives face looming deadlines. Trump wants to reduce interest rates and cut taxes on the wealthy.

news.title: Trump pledged not to cut Medicare — but his budget bill does just that
news.summary: The GOP megabill now under Senate consideration threatens healthcare insurance for more than 1 million seniors who rely on Medicare. The bill is called the Medicare Modernization Act of 2013.

news.title: The so-called SPAC king prepares to launch another: ‘The last time wasn’t a success by any means’
news.summary: The so-called SPAC king, who created a dozen special-purpose acquisition vehicles that lost investors billions of dollars, says he’s getting back in the business.

news.title: I’m 51, earn $129K and have $165K in my 401(k). Can I afford to retire when my husband, 59, draws Social Security at 62?
news.summary: He is retired from a state job and receives a pension that nets around $3,600 per month, as well as lifelong health insurance for both of us.
